Reviews.Title: Looks Good
Reviews.Author: KdKazaam
Reviews.Content: Great camera, so many adjustments. The best thing is the joints are all balls. So you can adjust the camera in multiple directions which is invaluable.Need more of these!

ProductInfo.Features:
Vari-Focal 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens
700 TV lines
42 PCS infrared IR LED
Vandal proof & water proof
Automatic tracking white balance
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc GW36WD Professional 700TVL 1/3-Inch Sony Super HAD CCD II Outdoor Security Camera with Vari-Focal 2.8-12mm Lens (White)
